title: 247 19 "The Man Who Is Loved Even by His Ship! Usopp's Tears!"Transliteration: "Fune kara mo aisareta otoko! Usoppu no namida!" (Japanese:船からも愛された男!ウソップの涙!) Morio Hatano Hirohiko Kamisaka October 30, 2005(2005-10-30)[393][394] March 30, 2014
